item.title: How I Built My Own Ad-Blocking DNS Server in the Cloud (2025 Updated Edition!)
item.description: Enjoy a faster, ad-free internet everywhere. This 2025 guide details how to build a free, private DNS server with AdGuard Home on an AWS EC2 instance, complete with SSL encryption and automated renewal.
